objects.text:
• Premium X-series mirrorless camera
• Advanced interchangeable lens system
• Professional-grade image sensor
• Compact & lightweight for travel

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Professional Mirrorless Camera | Classic Design Meets Modern Innovation
product_details.description:
• Premium Fujifilm X-series mirrorless camera with retro-inspired design
• Advanced interchangeable lens system with superior optical quality
• Professional-grade image sensor for exceptional photo quality
• Classic manual control dials for intuitive operation
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel photography
• High-performance autofocus system for precise shooting
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens system
• Durable black metal construction with ergonomic grip
• Multiple shooting modes and creative filters
• Built-in electronic viewfinder for accurate composition
• Wi-Fi connectivity for instant photo sharing
• Ideal for both photography enthusiasts and professionals

banner_details:
The banner features a bold, attention-grabbing promotional layout for a professional camera product. At the top is a prominent, high-impact text layer labeled "tagline", styled in an eye-catching red color to announce a special offer. Below it, the "heading" defines the product name in strong, modern typography, followed by a sleek, futuristic "subheading" offering a brief positioning statement. The "description" block uses bullet points to highlight key product features in a clean, white font. Urgency is driven home by the "urgency_text" in red and upbeat language above the large, bold "price". A strong call-to-action (CTA) includes an orange rounded rectangle button ("cta_button") with "cta" text overlay. The right side prominently showcases the camera image ("product_image") for maximum product visibility. The background uses layered grayscale rectangles and soft outline patterns to give depth and focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black (#1A1A1A)
- Dark Gray (#2C2C2C)
- Light Gray (#D4D4D4)
- Vivid Red-Orange (#DD2C00)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera with a sleek, professional aesthetic dominated by matte black and metallic tones. The main color palette includes deep charcoal black (#1C1C1C), metallic silver (#C0C0C0), glossy lens black (#2A2A2A), and subtle accents of white (#FFFFFF) and bright orange (#FF6F00) on the lens indicator. These colors are blended with smooth gradients and reflective highlights that enhance the metallic finish while remaining well-balanced. The lens glass adds a slight green-yellow tint (#B2C85B), giving a modern, high-tech feel. This bold yet minimal palette is ideal for a premium, sophisticated advertisement banner.
